column2: A preference for following in others' footsteps rather than initiating action. Reliable in execution as long as someone else provides the initial ideas. Weak survival mechanisms.
Enjoys challenge and action, and becomes frustrated with no recourse for change. An expectation that others will also rise to a challenge.
A tendency to flit from one thing to another, with difficulty settling down. Enjoys change, but lacks the stability needed to see things through.
Dislikes change. An expectation that others will be reliable.
Difficulty adapting to new situations. A tendency to be inflexible when faced with the demands of change and other people.
A tendency to procrastinate. An expectation that others will be flexible.
